name: auto-inspector

scripts.example: npm run start -- --url=https://www.ecosia.org/ --user-story='As a user, searching for Magic Inspector, I can see the results talking about Magic Inspector.'
scripts.example:failure: npm run start -- --url=https://www.ecosia.org/ --user-story='As a user searching for Magic Inspector, I can see the results talking about Bob Dylan.'
scripts.example:variables: npm run start -- --url=https://app.magicinspector.com/ --user-story='As a user authenticated with {{user_email}} and {{user_password}}, I can see the dashboard.'

author: Kevin Piacentini <kevin@agentlabs.dev>
description: Auto Inspector is an autonomous AI Agent that will test your website and give you a report of the results.
